segments.text: I see the boy is really going for it, trying to get as many cookies as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how brave he is, standing on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl is just standing there, waiting for her turn, it's quite sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still overflowing, and it's starting to spread towards the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is completely in her own world, not noticing anything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes are stacked neatly, but they might not stay that way for long.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit worried about the boy, he's really taking a risk there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, it's a nice contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will manage to get away with their little cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a mix of tension and calm, it's quite fascinating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
